name: Firefighter
overview: Fire Fighter or Firefighter is a Strategy game, developed and published by Luna Software, which was released in 1982. Fire Fighter is a one player strategy game. The player's job is to stop a rapidly spreading forest fire. The nearby countryside is displayed on a grid which includes, woods, lakes, and houses. Each turn, the player is able to drop water, set a back fire, or dig a fire break. The goal is to defeat the fires while minimizing property damage to the surrounding countryside. Constantly changing wind conditions effect the speed and direction of spread of the fire. The player has a limited time to make each move as the fire spreads. There are 9 levels of fire difficulty.
